title: Granola Gear - Eco Friendly Phone Case for iPhone XR - Biodegradable, Compostable, Plastic-Free, Made from Plants - Pink Sands
features: BASED IN THE USA - Granola Gear is based in Northern Michigan, surrounded by nature. This beautiful environment around us was the inspiration to create an alternative to plastic and liquid silicone phone cases.

KEEPING IT REAL - The images you see are actual photos of Granola Gear cases taken in the Northwoods of Michigan, showcasing colors to fit the styles of women, men, girls, and boys. These are not the 3D renderings you normally see on Amazon. Take a look around. Do you want to buy your next phone case based off computer renderings, or real life photos?

INSPIRED BY NATURE - We love the outdoors and are committed to protecting the world God gave us. Eco-Friendly Granola Gear cases are made of plants and verified to meet EN 13432 and ASTM D6400 standards for compostability. Please join us in making a difference for the future of our Earth.

ECO-FRIENDLY PACKAGING - Just like the cases, our slim packaging is also 100% plastic free. Our eco friendly packaging was designed to be recycled, and is an extra step to keep plastic out of the picture.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We are confident you will love the feel of your Granola Gear case (both in your hand and on your conscience). That's why we offer a money back guarantee on every phone case.
description: Based in Northern Michigan, Granola Gear is committed to protecting the world God gave us by offering an alternative to plastic or liquid silicone phone cases. Our phone cases are made from plant based material and are 100% plastic free.Please join us in making a difference for the future of our Earth. The images you see are actual photos of granola gear cases taken in the Northwoods of Michigan, showcasing colors to fit the styles of women, men, girls, and boys. These are not the 3D renderings you normally see here.Give Granola Gear a try. We're so sure you'll like it that we offer a money-back guarantee.Granola Gear - Protect your Phone, Protect our Planet
